channel.title: Java on IYP UK
channel.description: Recent content in Java on IYP UK

item.title: Java Spring Boot Getting Started
item.description: Part 1: Basic set up Steps inspired by spring boot getting started guide. Add some basic dependencies and Java file to return Hello world! See the code on github. Part 2: Using spring boot Typical project layout com +- example +- myapplication +- Application.java | +- customer | +- Customer.java | +- CustomerController.java | +- CustomerService.java | +- CustomerRepository.java | +- order +- Order.java +- OrderController.
